info.title: Carbonmark REST API
info.description: Welcome to the API Reference docs for **version 6.2.0** of the Carbonmark REST API. Use this API to view assets, prices, supply, activity and more. Looking for the latest version? Visit our [GitHub Releases page](https://github.com/KlimaDAO/klimadao/releases). ## Quick start Be sure to prefix a version number, otherwise your application will be exposed to breaking changes. ~~~ts const res = await fetch("https://v6.2.0.api.carbonmark.com/projects"); const projects = await res.json(); ~~~ For a developer guides and example implementations, or to learn more about Carbonmark and Digital Carbon Market, view our product knowledge base at docs.carbonmark.com. ##

creditTokenAddress.description: ⚠️Deprecated. Project may have multiple token addresses.

poolName.description: Lowercase name of pool / pool token e.g. 'bct'

poolAddress.description: Address of the pool itself, e.g. bct token address

projectTokenAddress.description: Address of the project token in this pool

isPoolDefault.description: True if default project for pool and no selective redemption fee applies

singleUnitPrice.description: formatted USDC price for 1 tonne e.g. '0.123456'

items.description: Marketplace listing with per-tonne price and project info.

tokenAddress.description: Address of the asset being sold

singleUnitPrice.description: USDC price per tonne. Unformatted 6 decimal string. e.g. 1000000

expiration.description: Unix Timestamp (seconds) when the listing expires.

minFillAmount.description: Minimum quantity for purchase transaction to succeed.

Listing.description: Marketplace listing with per-tonne price and project info.

tokenAddress.description: Address of the asset being sold

singleUnitPrice.description: USDC price per tonne. Unformatted 6 decimal string. e.g. 1000000

minFillAmount.description: Minimum quantity for purchase transaction to succeed.

NetworkParam.description: Optional. Desired blockchain network. Default is `polygon` (mainnet).

get.description: Retrieve an array of activities related to a carbon project
A list of all methodology categories used to delineate every project in the marketplace. A project may belong to one or more of these categories.
Retrieve an array containing the countries that carbon projects originate from
Retrieve an array of carbon projects filtered by desired query parameters

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Desired country of origin for carbon projects

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search carbon project names and descriptions for a string of text

parameters.name: expiresAfter
parameters.description: Only return projects listings that expire after this timestamp (Unix seconds)

parameters.name: minSupply
parameters.description: Only return projects listings and pools that contains at least this amount of credits (Tonnes)
